desc: SwapEnt-SamEtype is a sub-transformation method from EntitySwap which replace entities in text with random entities with the same type.

examples.ori: Fudan University is located in Shanghai Yangpu area.
examples.trans: CCTV is located in Shanghai Yangpu area.

examples.ori: The situation is very serious, matthias, 30, told reporters after meeting with ban in New York
examples.trans: The situation is very serious, John, 30, told reporters after meeting with ban in New York
